nodes.text: The Pirates of Tarnoonga: A Droid Adventure

The Pirates of Tarnoonga: A Droid Adventure is a Star Wars Legends children's book adaptation of the Star Wars Droids episode "The Pirates of Tarnoonga." It was written by Ellen Weiss, illustrated by Carter Concepts, Inc., and published on June 1, 1986 by Random House.
R2-D2 and C-3PO match wits with the evil space pirate Kybo Ren as they rush to the aid of their new friend, King Julpa, whose planet is being threatened by the pirates
The Pirates of Tarnoonga is an adaptation of the Star Wars: Droids episode of the same name, which was written by Peter Sauder.
